testcase.name: Catalog page - item selection
testcase.system-out: Given Catalog page is displayed.............................................passed When I select 2 qty of Glacier Sun Glasses and place order..................passed Then Place order page is displayed with items selected......................passed

testcase.name: Place order
testcase.system-out: Given Place order page is displayed.........................................passed When I checkout.............................................................passed Then billing information page should be displayed...........................passed

testcase.name: Billing page
testcase.system-out: Given Billing page is displayed.............................................passed When I input correct billing address........................................passed Then the system should take me to receipt page..............................passed
